label: Chapter 5: Building Your First Robot Application

link.title: Building Your First Robot Application
link.description: Apply everything from Part 1 to build a complete robot application. Integrate sensors, control actuators, and orchestrate multi-node behavior.

learningObjectives: Design a robot system architecture using ROS 2 patterns
Integrate multiple nodes for sensor processing and actuation
Debug ROS 2 systems using CLI tools and visualization
Deploy a complete robot application in simulation
